summary: Implements a PatchTSMixer based neural network customized for time series classification, initializing the model from a configuration and providing a forward computation that processes input sequences into class predictions.
business_intent: Allow developers to quickly integrate a state‑of‑the‑art PatchTSMixer architecture into time‑series classification pipelines, reducing development effort and improving model performance for business use cases such as anomaly detection, activity recognition, or predictive maintenance.
